description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout management of the App component in the frontend of a notes manager application. It defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, as well as styles for various elements like App header, links, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application's header section.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button.
